description: This file defines a React component named Board that renders the 4x4 grid for the 2048 game, including tiles and overlays for game over or game won states. It imports React functions and a Tile component, using hooks like useMemo for optimized rendering.

methods.name: Board({ board, lastSpawn, gameOver, gameWon, maxTile }, ref)
methods.description: React functional component rendering the game board, tiles, and overlays based on props.
